items.value:
You are back in time!
I need you for a Special Order.
Do you know XCoder? He's hiding somewhere Underground.
At the moment nobody really knows where he is.
Find him and see that he does Business with you.

Buy from XCoder: 5x Bong (for the Gang)

and then come back to me!
i have the Bongs and 3x free Slots at my Inventory!
i will find XCoder and geht them!

Great that you found XCoder!
I hope he wasn't too rude;)

You get:
6x Special Delivery (for Sergio, you know ..)
1x Brewery (boxed)

I think XCoder is now also a kind of friend.
You can definitely visit him more often to do jobs!

Sorry but we need the Bongs for the Gang!
Come back when you have them.

The Gang Boss loves to smoke with his best friends!
